overview: A short comedy mockumentary that follows Lovepump, a 1980s Guido hair band that ruled the fictional charts with hits like, "Death by the Slice", "Take it Eeezze", and "The Meatball Song".  Inspired by the classic film, This is Spinal Tap.
tagline: The untold story of the greatest fictional Guido hair band of the 1980s
title: LovePump: A Guido Rockumentary
